name: You Can't Add This
description:
You Can't Add This is a mathematical game for kids and adults. The game will be perfect for those who are into brain training, like to speed read or who want to train their memory and logical thinking!

🧠You Can't Add This will test even the best mathematicians! The game is a great way to pass the time, as well as a great means to work on those mathematical skills.

Advantages of You Can't Add This

🧩More than 150 unique levels with different complexity.
🧪Test your skills with challenging math modes and bonus questions.
🤓Algebra, Brackets, Negatives, Fractions, Decimals and everything else math class challenged you with.
🥇Achievements and Missions. Do tasks, get rewards.
🔒Unlock themes and music to customise your experience.

How to play?

✅Numbers and Symbols that form an equation pop up on screen one at a time at various word per minute speeds.
✅You must read and remember the equation word for word. Then solve that equation and pick the answer from a list of multiple choices.
✅If you are lost and have trouble remembering the equation life lines are provided to help.
✅The goal of the game is to show You Can't Add This that it is wrong and that you can add it all up.

Download our mathematical education game for free and start adding right now!
